speaker: Slag Heap
lines: Mountains of failures steam in the rain; they are beautiful in an honest way.
Blue glass nodules wink from the ash like promises that kept trying.
A bent nail straightens when you look away and sulks when you don't.
Someone dumped a bucket of water that now holds the sky upside down.
A strip of runed steel lies where no one can see it unless they can.
A lizard sunbaths on a rivet big as a knuckle.
The heap shifts with small avalanches of almost.
Even the trash here has edges.

give_item.name: Slag Mantle
give_item.description: A cloak pinned with cooled mistakes

choices.text: Pocket the runed strip for later.
